meaning: Malupet; used to describe something amazing or cool.
Idol; someone you admire or look up to.
Power; used to cheer someone on or show support.
Just kidding; often used humorously.
Gossip or casual conversation.
I wish everyone (including me); expressing envy in a light-hearted way.
Sound of tires screeching; often used to express excitement or show off.
Let’s do this; an invitation to get started or go for it.
Like that; used to affirm or agree with something.
An extravagant show; often used to describe someone’s gimmick or flair.
Best friend; used to call close friends.
Girlfriend or boyfriend; romantic partner.
It’s manageable; used to say you can handle something.
Foreigner; often used to describe a foreign romantic partner.
Lost; someone who fails or loses in something.
What a waste; used when something doesn't meet expectations.
Failed; used for someone who did poorly on something (like a test).
Someone who hangs out; often refers to people staying idle.
Let’s go; an invitation to do something together.
Paranoid; someone who is overthinking or acting suspiciously.
